description: Specifies the IO pin configuration used to automatically generate firmware.

description.description: Specifies a summary description of the IO pin function.

port.description: Specifies the microcontroller port where the pin is located.

pinNumber.description: Specifies the unique pin number in the defined port.

direction.description: Specifies whether the pin will be used as input or output.

pinMode.description: Specifies how the input pin is configured to handle floating inputs.

triggerMode.description: Specifies when the interrupt event for this pin should be triggered.

interruptPriority.description: Specifies the priority of the interrupt event for this pin.

interruptNumber.description: Specifies the interrupt number associated with this pin.

allowRead.description: Specifies whether reading the state of the output pin is allowed.

pinMode.description: Specifies the output pin wiring configuration.

initialState.description: Specifies the initial state of the output pin at boot time.

invert.description: Specifies whether the output logic of the pin should be inverted.
